```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(CodeClanData)
library(shiny)

cattle <- janitor::clean_names(read_csv("data/cattle-registrations-in-scotland-2015-1.csv"))

cattle$birth_month = factor(cattle$birth_month, levels = month.name)

names(cattle)

cattle_choices <- cattle %>% 
  group_by(breed) %>% 
  distinct(breed) %>% 
  pull()
  
cattle %>% 
  distinct(breed_type)
```
